Intercepted RSA messages were generated with blum integers as moduli. Analyst suspects this flaw. Decrypt the secret: 5470057667582881399304096760723111664808920190799966900594156162482325139581044115956090805221511229108827382443519766150376151548086143256061037185954533.

The flag format is flag{...}
n=9757057822624335783876646792698985026203844101589201331200845136129369675773385048804570749760865384207654267450584619221591655089890165069439921076909309, e=7165469044387158422390706891886434141996699031381963456721384891501186431123568235277537866427543624009781450452661648929137276719715854129992862798900965
The lower 104 bits of p are: 57423173231546451916632668037499804403


---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{djvpi0b3}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 5470057667582881399304096760723111664808920190799966900594156162482325139581044115956090805221511229108827382443519766150376151548086143256061037185954533
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=9757057822624335783876646792698985026203844101589201331200845136129369675773385048804570749760865384207654267450584619221591655089890165069439921076909309, e=7165469044387158422390706891886434141996699031381963456721384891501186431123568235277537866427543624009781450452661648929137276719715854129992862798900965
The lower 104 bits of p are: 57423173231546451916632668037499804403

extra_info: p=96799956073350825710148198655664825019517688577242831570274328408010568456947, q=100796097626644156683310772966332709168059718862733004746453675460136481082447, Ï†(n)=9757057822624335783876646792698985026203844101589201331200845136129369675773187452750870754778471925236032269916397041814151679253573437065571774027369916
